Posts.Content: Daisymay22 wrote: I had my biopsy almost a little over a month ago. The test came back benign but due to rapid cellular activity I am getting a lumpectomy this week. The last couple of days I have noticed itching and mild pain about where the masses are. Has anyone had this symptom this far out after biopsy? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: pain and itching a month after biopsy Daisymay22 chelle44
